TopicTitle: How can I get Jebediah back?

Articles.Content: He was killed when a launch went wrong when the SRB's overheated and exploded. Lah dee dah and it's been about 2-3 weeks now and he never came back. I went into my persistence file, changed his state to "0" and his TOD to "0" but they always change back. How do I get him back?

Don't worry, he should respawn soon or later.

Well, unless you turned respawning off...

Don't worry, he should respawn soon or later.

Well, unless you turned respawning off...

The thing is though, when I goto the astronaut center, when I goto missing or lost or something along those lines NOTHING is there. Absolutely nothing, even though I killed more kerbals then I care to count.
sent you a PM on this one

sent you a PM on this one

As I already stated in the post, changing it to "0" doesn't work, as his state always changes back to 1 or 3.
Then maybe the save is broke? When i alter state it fixes him....
